title: New: Nightlives – Give Nothing
body:
Despite this only being their second track, Toronto duo **Nightlives** have already begun making inroads into the blogosphere.

Debut track [Underneath](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17896-introducing-nightlives/) played upon their shoegaze influences, yet with the slick production skills that we’ve come to expect from the likes of **The Neighbourhood** and **Rhye**, whereas new cut _Give Nothing_ peels off the shiny coating and returns the songwriting to it’s grittier roots. With a booming chorus and jagged guitar lines, _Give Nothing_ is further reason to get excited about **_A Wink in the Face of Death_**, the debut LP from **Nightlives**.
